Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Reroute at 55th/Normal
ShortDescription: 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Union, 59th, Princeton and 55th due to, street blockage near 55th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Allow extra travel time.
